name: imagemagick-browser
description: Abstractions on top of WASM-ImageMagick to easy usage

scripts.test-server: npx concurrently --success first --kill-others 'npx tsc -w' 'npx gulp jasmine-server' 'npx opn http://localhost:8888 -- google-chrome-stable && sleep 9h'
scripts.test-browser: npm run test-project-build && npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run test-project-start > /dev/null" "sleep 5s && npm run test-node"
scripts.test-node: export NODE_PATH=$(npm root --quiet -g) && npx ts-node src/test/index.ts && echo $?
scripts.generate-convert-list-enums: npx ts-node scripts/generateImEnums.ts && npm run build
scripts.test-project-build: npm run build && cd test-project1 && npm i &&  npm run build && cd ..

author: Sebastian Gurin
